page.title: 09HOUSING ESTATES IN ROYSTON
page.content: I live on the {Ridings}and in front of our front garden is a path,and on the other side of the path are more houses.We are quite near the town,and the school is only a few minutes walk away.We are also near the park,but we have to go round the corner to get to our garage. The {Shaftesbury}estate is off Barkway Road.It is made up of two roads.The gardens are very steep.At the bottom there are mostly terraced or semi - detached houses.My house is a special kind.It is a staggered,terraced house. It is also split-level.It has a hill onto Grange Bottom.There are several car parking spaces. My house is on{Poplar Drive}estate. Forty years ago Honey Way was on an army camp and my uncle was stationed there in the war.Now there are many modern houses.
